00013 //Forces the compiler to aling this class on a 32 bit boundary
00014 //Needed to protect implemented type 'safety' check
00015 #pragma pack (4)
00016 namespace TBTrack {
00017 
00018 class FitConstants {
00019 
00020 public:
00021   enum Particle {
00022     electron,
00023     hadron
00024   };
00025 
00026   FitConstants(unsigned e=1, double err=0.0);  
00027 
00028   // Nominal momentum of beam
00029   double pBeam() const;
00030   void   pBeam(double p);
00031 
00032   void pBeamScale(double p);
00033  
00034   // z position of first calorimeter
00035   double zCalorimeter() const;
00036   void   zCalorimeter(double z);
00037  
00038   // z position of beam origin
00039   double zBeam() const;
00040   void   zBeam(double z);
00041  
00042   // Average beam coordinate
00043   double beamCoordinate(unsigned d) const;
00044   void   beamCoordinate(unsigned d, double c);
00045  
00046   // Average beam angle
00047   double beamAngle(unsigned d) const;
00048   void   beamAngle(unsigned d, double a);
00049 
00050   // Insert beam position and angle at once
00051   void beamAverage(unsigned d, double c, double a);
00052 
00053    // Beam spread error matrix
00054   TMatrixDSym beamSpread(unsigned d) const;
00055   void        beamSpread(unsigned d, const TMatrixDSym &e);
00056 
00057   // z of each layer
00058   double zLayer(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00059   void   zLayer(unsigned d, unsigned l, double z);
00060 
00061   // Forward scattering error matrix  
00062   // 6x6; layers 0-3, beam coordinate, beam angle
00063   TMatrixDSym forwardScattering(unsigned d, Particle p) const;
00064   void        forwardScattering(unsigned d, Particle p, const TMatrixDSym &e);
00065 
00066   // Backward scattering error matrix  
00067   // 6x6; cal coordinate, cal angle, layers 0-3
00068   TMatrixDSym backwardScattering(unsigned d, Particle p) const;
00069   void        backwardScattering(unsigned d, Particle p, const TMatrixDSym &e);
00070 
00071   // Intrinsic error
00072   double cError(unsigned d, unsigned l) const;
00073   void   cError(unsigned d, unsigned l, double e);
00074 
00075   // Probability cuts for track finding for nDof
00076   double probabilityCut(unsigned nDof) const;
00077   void   probabilityCut(unsigned nDof, double c);
00078 
00079   // z values and total error matrix for fit
00080   // 6x6; layers 0-3, beam coordinate, beam angle
00081   TrackFitInitialisation fitInitialisation(unsigned xy, unsigned fb, unsigned eh) const;
00082 
00083   // Error matrix for alignment using beam
00084   //TMatrixDSym alignmentMatrix(unsigned xy, unsigned eh, unsigned fb) const;
00085 
00086   // Write out a file for inclusion in code
00087   void writeIcc() const;
00088 
00089   std::ostream& print(std::ostream &o=std::cout, const std::string &s="") const;
00090 
00091 
00092   enum {numberOfInts=0};
00093   const int* intData() const;
00094         int* intData();
00095   enum {numberOfFloats=0};
00096   const float* floatData() const;
00097         float* floatData();
00098   enum {numberOfDoubles=3 + 2*2 + 2*3 + 2*4 + 2*2*21 + 2*2*21 + 2*4 + 4};
00099   const double* doubleData() const;
00100         double* doubleData();
00101 
00102 private:
00103   void convertErrorMatrix(const double *d, TMatrixDSym &e) const;
00104   void convertErrorMatrix(const TMatrixDSym &e, double *d);
00105   //  void pBeamScale(double p);
00106   void pBeamScale(double* mat, double p);
00107

00109   double _zCalorimeter;
00110   double _zBeam;
00111   double _beamAverage[2][2];
